1 // $Id: DateTextEditor.js 100 2008-02-26 09:38:02Z bobbicat71 $
  2 
  3 Ext.namespace('Ext.ux.netbox.date');
  4 
  5 /** It instantiates a new DateTextEditor
  6   * @class This class extends Ext.ux.netbox.FilterEditor to manage dates as value.
  7   * For a description of the parameters look at the documentation of Ext.Editor.
  8   * @constructor
  9   * @extends Ext.ux.netbox.FilterEditor
 10   */
 11 Ext.ux.netbox.date.DateTextEditor = function(field,config){
 12   Ext.ux.netbox.date.DateTextEditor.superclass.constructor.call(this,field,config);
 13   if(config.format==undefined){
 14     config.format='Y-m-d H:i:s';
 15   }
 16   this.format=config.format;
 17 }
 18 
 19 Ext.extend(Ext.ux.netbox.date.DateTextEditor,Ext.ux.netbox.FilterEditor,/** @scope Ext.ux.netbox.date.DateTextEditor.prototype */{
 20 
 21   /** This method gets the value. If the value inserted by the user is not a valid date, an empty array is returned.
 22    */
 23 
 24   getValue: function() {
 25     var val=Ext.ux.netbox.date.DateTextEditor.superclass.getValue.call(this);
 26     
 27     if(val===""){
 28       return([]);
 29     }else{
 30       return [{value: val.format('Y-m-d H:i:s'),label:val.format(this.format)}];
 31     }
 32   },
 33 
 34   setValue: function(val){
 35     var value;
 36     if(val.length==0){
 37       value="";
 38     }else{
 39       value=Date.parseDate(val[0].value, 'Y-m-d H:i:s');
 40     }
 41     Ext.ux.netbox.date.DateTextEditor.superclass.setValue.call(this,value);
 42   }
 43 
 44 });
